Package arcade.env.grid

Interface Grid

All Known Implementing Classes:
AgentGrid, HexAgentGrid
public interface Grid
A Grid represents the environment for agents.

Calculations for geometry, bounds, size, etc. can be handled either by the Location object that is passed in with the agent (using the Grid as a container class) or vice versa.

Since:
2.2
Version:
2.3.0

    • getAllObjects

      sim.util.Bag getAllObjects()
      Gets all agent objects in the grid.
      Returns:

      Adds an object to the location defined by the Location.

      obj - the object to add to the grid
      loc - the location to add the object
